title: Kasargod: Cool bar shawarma kills student, renders five seriously ill - Daijiworld.com
content:
1. Kasargod: Cool bar shawarma kills student, renders five seriously ill  Daijiworld.com
  2. Shawarma turns villain again; one dead, 14 hospitalised due to food poisoning in Kasaragod  Mathrubhumi English
  3. Girl dies from food poisoning after eating Shawarma; 15 others hospitalised  Deccan Herald
  4. Kerala schoolgirl dies after having rotten shawarma from snacks bar  The New Indian Express
  5. Kerala: Teenage girl dies, 14 others fall ill after having shawarma at Kasaragod restaurant  Times Now
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description:
Stephan Kayyar
Daijiworld Media Network -Kasargod(DV)
Kasargod, May 1: A 16-year-old student died of food poisoning in Cheruvathur here on Sunday, May 1.
The deceased has been identified as Devananda, a resident of Perala of Karivelluru.
The condition of five peopleÂ is said to be serious.
